fields.name: Lucky
fields.description: Lucky is a gentle horse who loves carrots.
fields.story: Lucky was rescued after being abandoned by his previous owner. He is very friendly and enjoys long walks.

fields.name: Spiky
fields.description: Spiky loves to play in the field and is very curious.
fields.story: Spiky was rescued from a smallholding where he had little care. He is now thriving and friendly.

fields.name: Clucky
fields.description: Clucky is a friendly hen who loves visitors.
fields.story: Clucky was found wandering near a farm. She is very social and lays plenty of eggs.
